name: Syensqo (formerly Solvay) - Cerafy Biomimetic Ceramides
description: Syensqo (formerly Solvay) is a global specialty chemicals company offering the Cerafy range of biomimetic ceramides. Their Cerafy Pure NPo is the first in the range, featuring pure biomimetic ceramide III (NP) designed to boost skin barrier function with biomimetic design for premium formulations.
notes: Global specialty chemicals company (formerly Solvay) with innovation focus on biomimetic ingredients. Cerafy range features pure biomimetic ceramide III (NP) designed to boost skin barrier function. Cerafy Pure NPo is the first product in the range. Biomimetic design ensures optimal compatibility with natural skin barrier. Ideal for premium barrier repair formulations requiring cutting-edge ceramide technology.
